copy.headline: Frequently asked questions
copy.subheadline: Below is a compilation of frequently-asked questions (FAQ) about Bisq, how to use it, and how to help the project.

microcopy.text: Version Context: Bisq is evolving software. While many principles here are general, specific examples regarding trade mechanics, limits, and security often refer to the classic Bisq v1 trading protocol unless stated otherwise. The current platform is Bisq 2, which supports multiple protocols including Bisq Easy (which may have different rules, e.g., using Reputation instead of security deposits).
microcopy.purpose: Clarifies version differences and provides crucial context for understanding content

microcopy.text: Feel free to ask further questions on any of Bisq's many outreach channels linked at the bottom of this page.
microcopy.purpose: Encourages user engagement and directs to support channels

microcopy.text: 1.1 How is Bisq different from other decentralized exchanges?
microcopy.purpose: Organizes and previews FAQ topics for quick scanning
